name: Troll Cave
description:
Collaboration with my 5 year old daughter.  She laid out the plans using her sticker book and dictated the art and told me when I put a pixel in the wrong place.  

Click and drag to place your fairy where you want her to be.  The further she is away from the start (bottom left) the more points you get for winning!  Difficulty increases the more you win.

Press the arrow keys to determine the next direction of arrow you will receive.

Now it is time for the troll to eat the fairy.  

Art & Code made in GameMaker, Sound effects made using the Korg Kamata gadget.

Pizza Jam 2018.  Theme was not pizza.
